text: John William DiMaggio (born September 4, 1968) is an American voice actor who's the voice of Bender in Futurama and Jake the Dog in Adventure Time. ==Filmography== ===Film=== ====Feature films==== List of voice performances in feature films Year Title Role Notes Dr. Dolittle 2 Wassup Fish, Mouse, Seeing Eye Dog Barnyard Bud, Officer O'Hanlon Happily N'Ever After Dwarf #1, Dwarf #2, Giant TMNT Colonel Santino Underdog Attack, Bulldog Bee Movie Janitor, Bailiff Bolt Saul 2011 Transformers: Dark of the Moon Leadfoot 2012 Wreck- It Ralph Beard Papa 2014 Transformers: Age of Extinction Crosshairs 2016 Zootopia Jerry Jumbeaux Jr, Woolter, Jesse, Pig Reporter, Moose 2017 Transformers: The Last Knight Crosshairs, Nitro Zeus 2018 Teen Titans Go!
